page.title: 06Punks
page.content:
Punks are normally seen with mohican haircuts, spiked often brightly dyed hair. They use hair gel or egg to make their hair stand on end. Their clothes vary but in the area I live there are two girls who dress in the same kind of gear. One has shaved her head around the sides and fluffed up her hair so as she looks like an orange tree. I have seen her wearing black cotton dungarees, a man's pyjama top dyed orange, orange socks and tiny black boots. Her friend wears the same kind of clothes.
Some punks dress in leather clothes and chains. I think punks' clothes are really nice and would like to wear them. Adults, like my parents aren't too sure about punks though so I have to dress like everyone else.
